maqras.text: khea miru dxk hrux wa meux sing thi xyu nı hlum fang sph thuk hı fun khun ma
læa sing thi xyu nı hawxk thuk pheyx xk
thæcring phracea khxng phwk khea nı wan nan thrng trahnak nı phwk khea xyang nænxn
xal kx ri xahˌ
xal kx ri xahˌ nan khux xari
læa xari thi thahı cea di ru wa xal kx ri xahˌ nan khux xari
wan thi mnusʹy ca pen chen mælng mea thi kracay wxn
læa brrda phukhea ca pen chen khnsatw thi pliw wxn
swn phu thi trachu khxng khea hnak
khea k ca xyu nı kar mi chiwit thi phasuk
læa swn phu thi trachu khxng khea bea
thi phanak khxng khea k khux hew luk (ha wi yahˌ)
læa xari lea thi thahı cea ru di wa hew luk khux xari
khux fi xan rxn ræng
kar sasm thraphysmbati pheux xwdxang di thahı phwk cea phelidphelin
cnkrathang phwk cea di kheapi yeuxn hlum fang sph
pela ley phwk cea ca di ru
læw k pela ley phwk cea ca di ru
michı chen nan tha phwk cea di ru xyang thæcring læw
læw nænxn phwk cea ca hen fi thi luk chon
læw nænxn phwk cea ca di hen man dwy sayta thi næchad
Læw nı wan nan phwk cea ca thuk sxbtham keiyw kab khwam pordpran thi di rab (nı lok dun ya)
khx saban dwy kal wela
thæcring mnusʹy nan xyu nı kar khadthun
nxkcak brrda phu sraththa læa kratha khwam di thanghlay læa takteuxn kanlæakan nı sing thi pen sacthrrm læa takteuxn kanlæakan hı mi khwam xdthn
khwam hayna cng prasb dæ thuk phu nintha læa phu sıray phu xun
sung khea sasm thraphysmbati læa hman nab man xyu semx
doy khid wa thraphysmbati khxng khea nan ca thahı khea xyu di tlxd pi
michı chen nan nænxn khea ca thuk yon lng pi nı fi nrk (xalhuteaa mahˌ)
læa xari lea thi thahı cea ru di wa fi nrk (xalhuteaa mahˌ) nan khux xari
khux fi khx ngxallxhˌ thi thuk cud hı luk chon
sung man ca luk him kheapi nı hawcı
thæcring man ca luk him khlum bn phwk khea xyang midchid
xyu nı sphaph khxng sea sung chalud
cea mi hen dxk hrux wa phracea khxng cea di kratha kab phwk ceakhxng chang xyangri
phraxngkh midi thrng thahı phæn karn khxng phwk khea suy sin dxk hrux
læa di thrng sng nk pen fung«lng mab nph wk khea
man di khwang phwk khea dwy hin thi tha dwy din khæng
læw phraxngkh thrng thahı phwk khea pen chen bımi thi thuk (satw) kin
pheux hı khwam khunkhey kæ cha wkurech
pheux hı khwam khunkhey kæ phwk khea nı kar deinthangnı vdu hnaw (pi yemen) læa vdu rxn (pi cham)
dangnan cng hı phwk khea khearph phakdi phracea hæng ban hlang ni theid (khux xal kaxˌbahˌ)
phuthrng hı xahar kæ phwk khea hı phn cak khwam hiw læa thrng hı khwam plxdphay kæ phwk khea hı phn cak khwam hwad klaw
cea hen læw michı hrux phu thi ptiseth kar txbthæn (nı prlok)
nan k khux phu thi khab li dek kaphra
læa mi snabsnun nı kar hı xahar kæ phu khadsn
dangnan khwam hayna cng mi dæ brrda phu tha lahmad
phu thi phwk khea laley tx kar lahmad khxng phwk khea
phu thi phwk khea xoxwd kan
læa phwk khea hwnghæn kheruxng chı lek«nxy (kæ pheuxnban)
Thæcring rea di pra tha nxal kea sar kæ cea læw
dangnan cea cng lahmad pheux phracea khxng cea læa cng cheuxd satw phli
thæcring satru khxng cea nan khea pen phu thuk tadkhad
cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa xo brrda phu ptiseth sraththa xey
chan ca mi khearph phakdi sing thi phwk than khearph phakdi xyu
læa phwk than k michı pen phu khearph phakdi phracea thi chan khearph phakdi
læa chan k michı pen phu khearph phakdi sing thi phwk than khearph phakdi
læa phwk than k michı pen phu khearph phakdi phracea thi chan khearph phakdi
sahrab phwk than k khux sasna khxng phwk than læa sahrab chan k khux sasna khxng chan
meux khwam chwyhelux khx ngxallxhˌ læa kar phichit di ma thung læw
læa cea di hen prachachn khea nı sasna khx ngxallxhˌ pen hmu«
dangnan cng sæsxng sdudi dwy kar srrseriy phracea khxng cea læa cng khxxphay thosʹ tx phraxngkh theid thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ semx
mux thang sxng khx ngxabi la hab cng phinas læa khea k phinas læw
thraphysmbati khxng khea læa sing thi khea di khwnkhway xea wi nan midi xanwy prayochn kæ khea ley
khea ca kheapi phea him nı nrk thi mi fi luk chon
thang phriya khxng khea dwy nang pen phu bæk fun
thi khx khxng nang mi cheuxk thak dwy yı xinthphlam
cng klaw theid (muhammad) phra xngkh khux xallxh phuthrng xe ka
xallxhˌ nan thrng pen thiphung
phraxngkh mi prasuti læa mi thrng thuk prasuti
læa mimi phu dı semx hemuxn phraxngkh
cng klaw theid (muhammad) kha phraxngkh khx khwam khumkhrxng tx phracea hæng rungxrun
hı phn cak khwam chaw ray thi phraxngkh di thrng bandal khun
læa cak khwam chaw ray hæng khwam mud khxng kal wela klangkhun meux man phæ khlum
læa cak khwam chaw ray khxng brrda phu sek pea nı pm ngeuxn
læa cak khwam chaw ray khxng phu xiccha meux khea xiccha
cng klaw theid (muhammad) kha phraxngkh khx khwam khumkhrxng tx phracea hæng mnusʹychati
phra racha hæng mnusʹychati
phrapencea hæng mnusʹychati
Hı phn cak khwam chaw ray khxng phu krasibkrasab thi hlxklx
thi krasibkrasab nı hawxk khxng mnusʹy
cak hmu yin læa mnusʹy
